remarks: Existential quantification under an image in terms of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
statement:
rexima.x $e |- ( x = ( F ` y ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rexima $p |- ( ( F Fn A /\ B C_ A ) -> ( E. x e. ( F " B ) ph <-> E. y e. B ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
